entries.content: Objections are not rejections but requests for more information.
entries.notes: Implied through the demonstration of handling objections as opportunities to engage further.

entries.content: Respond to objections by asking clarifying questions to uncover the real need.
entries.notes: Demonstrated when the speaker asks about the pen's significance to the interviewer.

entries.content: A good salesman enables the prospect to discover their own need, rather than convincing them.
entries.notes: Highlighted as a key principle in effective selling.

entries.content: Turning the 'sell me this pen' scenario into a discovery of the interviewer's need for the pen.
entries.notes: Practical demonstration of handling objections as info requests.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
